attributes.additional_details:
My aims are to:
- Raise awareness of the effect of tuition fees to the government and general public as the impact of the raise in tuition fees well effect the UK intensely negatively.
- To of course decrease the price of tuition fees or if possible scrap tuition fees!
- Give university chances to the less fortunant as with the high tuition fees it will be impossible or very hard for them to enter university.
- Enable a higher range of job options for people by increasing the university graduate rate.
- To save the UK economy as the raise in tuition fees will subliminally effect are economy because if you don't go university you get a very low chance of getting jobs which will lead to many people eating of benefits.
- To get more information on tuition fees e.g. why it was raised and why is there tuition fees in the first place.
